alert.note: Alert for Moody (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 12 at 9:04PM MDT until further notice by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls SD has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in South Dakota... Big Sioux River near Egan affecting Moody County. ...FLOOD WARNING FOR SNOWMELT IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring. * WHERE...Big Sioux River near Egan. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 1516.5 feet, flooding begins to affect agricultural lands around Egan. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 1516.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 PM CDT Wednesday was 1516.6 feet. - Forecast...No forecast is available for this location. - Flood stage is 1516.5 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (unknown time) Location Stg Stg Day/Time d1 d2 d3 Big Sioux River Egan 1516.5 1516.6 Wed 9 pm MSG MSG MSG &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late Thursday night at 1215 AM CDT.
